com.io7m.r2.filters

Interface R2FilterBoxBlurParametersType<SD extends R2RenderTargetDescriptionType,S extends R2RenderTargetUsableType<SD>,DD extends R2RenderTargetDescriptionType,D extends R2RenderTargetUsableType<DD>>

  • Type Parameters:
    SD - The type of source render target descriptions
    S - The type of source render targets
    DD - The type of destination render target descriptions
    D - The type of destination render targets
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2FilterBoxBlurParameters

    public interface R2FilterBoxBlurParametersType<SD extends R2RenderTargetDescriptionType,S extends R2RenderTargetUsableType<SD>,DD extends R2RenderTargetDescriptionType,D extends R2RenderTargetUsableType<DD>>

    Parameters for box blur filters that blur render targets of type S and write the blurred results to render targets of type T.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • sourceRenderTarget

        S sourceRenderTarget()
        Returns:
        The source render target

      • sourceTextureSelector

        Function<S,R2Texture2DUsableType> sourceTextureSelector()
        Returns:
        A function that, given a render target of type S, selects which texture on that render target will be used for blurring.

      • outputRenderTarget

        D outputRenderTarget()
        Returns:
        The output render target

      • outputTextureSelector

        Function<D,R2Texture2DUsableType> outputTextureSelector()
        Returns:
        A function that, given a render target of type D, selects which texture on that render target will be used for blurring.

      • renderTargetPool

        R2RenderTargetPoolUsableType<DD,D> renderTargetPool()
        Returns:
        A pool used to construct temporary render targets

      • blurParameters

        default R2BlurParameters blurParameters()
        Returns:
        The blur parameters

      • outputDescriptionScaler

        BiFunction<DD,com.io7m.jareas.core.AreaInclusiveUnsignedLType,DD> outputDescriptionScaler()
        Returns:
        A function that, given an existing description D and an area A, returns a new description with the values of D and the area A.
